title: Incentive-Compatible Mechanisms for Norm Monitoring in Open Multi-Agent Systems (Extended Abstract).
abstract: We  consider  the  problem  of  detecting  norm  violations  in  open  multi-agent  systems  (MAS).  In this extended abstract, we outline the approach of [Alechina et al., 2018], and show how, using ideas from scrip  systems,  we  can  design  mechanisms where the agents comprising the MAS are incen-tivised  to  monitor  the  actions  of  other  agents  for norm violations
